item.description:
A Sex and The City inspired fashion photo event here in Boston. Fall is coming and the fashions are fabulous. We're planning our own Sex and The City inspired fashion photo event, here in the city of Boston.

We will select our own inspired Carrie, Samantha, Charlotte, Miranda and of course, Mr. Big.

We'll select a trendy neighborhood for the girls to meet.

One fabulous where they will shop.

A bakery where cupcakes will be indulged.

and....

And and upscale bar to catch all the gossip.

Our planning meeting will be 1-2 sessions max. We want to define the locations, select the dates to get this event moving.

 

Please RSVP if you plan to attend.

If you have previously RSVP'd and will not be attending or participating, please update your status.

 

Thank you.

 

Lorrie Pearson

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near Pardise Bakery Cafe

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Sex and The City Of Boston -planning session
